clickToRestore.message: Left click to open the menu. Click the middle button to restore the '$name$' session in a new window, ctrl-click (Windows, Linux) or cmd-click (Mac) in the current window

confirmClose.message: Open this session and close current window(s)? (Cannot undo!)

confirmDeleteQuestion.message: Are you sure you want to remove this session?

description.message: Need simple session management? Several users on the same Firefox? MySessions is a simple cross browser session manager.

emptySession.message: No window is selected in this session

enterSessionName.message: Please enter the name of the session

exportedSessionCopyTips.message: Ctrl+c or Cmd+c to copy your session

minutes.message:
minutes.
Recommended: 5 minutes. Auto-saving too
frequently may slow down your machine.

optionsBackupPeriod.message: Saves all your windows and tabs every

optionsBackupPeriodOutOfRange.message: Backup period cannot be shorter than 1 minute or larger than 999 minutes

optionsReorder.message: Move session to top after edit

restoreSession2.message: Click to open session in new window

saveFail.message: Fail to save session. Please try again later

saveSessionButtonDescription.message: Click here to save this as a new MySessions session

sizeWarning.message: * If the size is too small, it may distort the layout.

msHeadingNewTitle.message: You can drag and drop tabs between windows

msSaveList.message: Uncheck tabs that you don't want to be saved.

snapshotHint.message: * 'Snapshot #1' up to 'Snapshot #5' are sessions that are saved in an earlier Firefox use. You may find them helpful if the most recent session is corrupted or is not exactly what you want.

supportUs.message:
Support our development and
share to your friends!

updatedMessage.message: MySessions is updated, click here to see what's new

Left click will open the tabs sequential.message: Left click will open the tabs sequentially, middle click will open the tabs together.

optionsShowAutoSave.message: Show autosaved sessions in the session list.
